00023 namespace boost {
00024 namespace xint {

00026 using namespace detail;
00027 
00036 std::string to_string(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t base, bool uppercase) {
00037     try {
00038         return to_string(xint::integer(n), base, uppercase);
00039     } catch (std::exception&) {
00040         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00041         else return std::string();
00042     }
00043 }
00044 
00049 nothrow_integer nothrow_from_string(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00050     try {
00051         if (str==detail::nan_text) return nothrow_integer::nan();
00052         return nothrow_integer(xint::from_string(str, base));
00053     } catch (std::exception&) {
00054         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00055         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00060 nothrow_integer nothrow_from_binary(const std::string& str) {
00061     try {
00062         return nothrow_integer(xint::from_binary(str));
00063     } catch (std::exception&) {
00064         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00065         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00070 std::string to_binary(const nothrow_integer& n) {
00071     try {
00072         return to_binary(xint::integer(n));
00073     } catch (std::exception&) {
00074         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00075         else return std::string();
00076     }
00077 }
